body.name: LEGO Icons Dried Flower Centerpiece 10314, Botanical Collection Crafts Set for Adults, Artificial Flowers with Rose and Gerbera, Table or Wall Decoration, Unique Home Décor Gift
features: Cultivate Creativity – Build and display a beautiful LEGO Icons Dried Flower Centerpiece (10314) with this mindful building project for adults. Inspire creativity and imagination with this unique flower kit.

Fall Inspiration – This flower gift building kit is full of vibrant blooms and warm colors inspired by the beauty of autumn. With a gerbera and rose as its focal point, it's perfect for any fall decoration theme
Build Together – The model has a split design, so you and a loved one can enjoy building and bonding together. Spend quality time while you relax and let your creativity bloom
Versatile Decor – Once complete, the model can be used as a table centerpiece, hung on a wall, or combined with one or more sets to create a large flower decor display

Perfect Gift – Florists and flower lovers alike will appreciate this LEGO Icons Dried Flower Centerpiece. Give it as a gift for any occasion, or use it as a unique and creative way to say "I love you."

Mindful building – Whether you're a seasoned builder or just starting, this LEGO kit offers a fun and mindful way to spend your time. Enjoy the process of building and creating something beautiful that you can display in your home or office.
body.description: Cultivate a piece of home decor that requires zero maintenance with this LEGO Icons Dried Flower Centerpiece (10314) crafts sets for adults. An immersive building project, the artificial flowers set is bursting with vibrant blooms inspired by the colors of autumn. The LEGO Icons flowers set for adults features rose and gerbera as its focal point. Once it’s complete, you can use it as a striking home centerpiece or hang it as flower wall decor to create a floral display to cherish forever. The buildable model has a split design that allows 2 people to construct it at the same time, providing the perfect way to spend quality time with a friend or family member. You can also use the LEGO Builder App to store instructions as well as view, zoom and rotate your creation as you build the real model. Part of the revolutionary LEGO Botanical flower and plant Collection for adults, this buildable model set includes several elements made from plant-based plastic produced using sustainably sourced sugar cane and makes a unique flower gift idea for adults who love arts and crafts activities. This product measures 7 cm (3 in.) high, 40 cm (16 in.) wide and 13 cm (5 in.) deep. Contains 812 Pieces.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Create a Dried Flower Centerpiece Let your creativity blossom and build a beautiful piece of home decor that’s inspired by the colors of fall.
Build blooms together The centerpiece can be built by multiple people, providing an opportunity to make special memories with loved ones.

LEGO Icons Dried Flower Centerpiece A beautiful centerpiece Impress your guests with a stunning table centerpiece. Arrange the dried flowers Enjoy discovering different bouquet combinations. Combine multiple sets Multiple sets (sold separately) form a larger display.
Relax with a mindful building project Immerse yourself in the creation of this Dried Flower Centerpiece and enjoy discovering its intricate details.
A beautiful LEGO display A beautiful LEGO display Once complete, the set becomes a meaningful piece of home decor for LEGO fans that will add joy to the home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful set, wonderful addition to the collection
reviews.reviewText: I love this series of sets and I'm glad I decided to pick this one up too. It was a fun build with a lot of clever techniques, easy to follow instructions. Beautiful once assembled, especially the large flowers. So much lovely detail—get one yourself already! 🌻🌹🌷🌼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great Lego set!
reviews.reviewText: Very nice Lego set! Looks very beautiful and wasn’t too difficult to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not huge & not overly small. Makes for a cute decorations in a small area such as an office or an end table. A little small for a coffee table. Colors are perfect for Autum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: beautiful centerpiece, fun to assemble, and a great gift for my father as wall art!! who could ask for more?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool Lego Set!
reviews.reviewText: I'm lazy and hardly ever write reviews. But this Lego set was so cool, I thought I'd make the effort!My daughter and I had so much fun putting this together. The colors are nice and the pieces are movable. The directions were easy to follow as well. Beautiful set and we look forward to using it every Thanksgiving!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Set, Perfect Centerpiece
reviews.reviewText: I love the Lego botanical sets, they are the perfect blend of my two favorite hobbies. This was a great little centerpiece during the fall and now sits nicely next to our hydroponic garden!Value is almost always the same across the board with all Lego sets due to how they price them, so it's exactly what you would expect. I would warn that there are a TON of very very small pieces, so if dexterity is an issue this set can be a struggle!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but so beautiful
reviews.reviewText: Our 10 year-old LEGO loving granddaughter put this together by herself in about 5 hours. It is very intricate and some pieces are tiny but the end product is just beautiful! It served as the centerpiece on our Thanksgiving dessert table and everyone was very complimentary and truly amazed. As long as you follow the directions step by step, it’s not that difficult for a 10-14 year old, otherwise an adult may need to help. Look at the dimensions of the finished product so you will know the size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for anyone who enjoys the Botanical Lego line
reviews.reviewText: This was a birthday purchase for my wife who collects these.Let's be clear, these are Legos if you are familiar with them then you know that their quality is second to none.I am constantly impressed with this line from Lego, and if you enjoy plants, table decorations and building Legos then these are for you. They are gorgeous, and my wife reported that they are not difficult to assemble.If you get the chance, pick them up before they are retired.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy intuitivo, apto para armar en pareja
reviews.reviewText: El producto es muy bonito, muy intuitivo el instructivo. Trae diferentes paquetes de piezas y dos instructivos para que se pueda armar al mismo tiempo por 2 personas
I always say Lego is expensive but the detail, colors and design of this thing is sick. I love it so much! Great purchase.
Llego muy bien cuidado, a mi mamá le encantó su regalo

reviews.reviewTitle: was a hit for a birthday gift
reviews.reviewText: this is a nice set challenging for a pre teen but also enjoyable to build
